mean_en: an attempt, by a large number of people, to change the government of a country, especially by violent action; a great change in conditions, ways of working, beliefs, etc. that affects large numbers of people
sentence: A revolution in science and technology has changed the way that we communicate.
sentence_trans: 科技革命改变了我们的通信方式。
word_etyma: re重新 + volut旋转，卷 + ion名词后缀 → 重新旋转 → 革命，变革
